attributes.action: To hold a second referendum for those who voted based misinformation.
attributes.additional_details: Whether you voted to leave or remain, the deciding factors of your vote should have been based on truths, facts and the full story not based on misinformation and political gain.
attributes.background:
As we can all see, this Brexit and deal or no deal situation is getting out of hand. I don't think we the public were given the true information and facts as to what will happen and 
the knock on effects it will have. We voted based on a severe lack of information and misleading soundbites.
